monologue.text: You find yourself face to face with a large, imposing figure.
The Drummer’s eyes are closed in a moment of serenity, as if nothing could faze him.
He’s got a calmness that seems almost impossible in such a chaotic setting.
His long hair is tied back, his clothes chic but well-worn.
He looks as if he’s just come down from meditating under a waterfall...
